name: Undead Zombie Assault VR
description:
• Undead Zombie Assault VR •

Get ready to defend from zombies in virtual reality! Experience the real sensation and thrill of the undead with your mobile virtual reality headset. Look in the direction you want to shoot your gun and don't get bitten by zombies!

• How To Play •

This game is for 3D mobile virtual reality headsets. To FIRE look at the direction of incoming enemies and you will start shooting. To WALK look down at an angle and you will start moving. Press the X option in the top left corner to play in normal mode or the VR onscreen icon the play in VR mode.

• Features •

- Stereoscopic virtual reality rendering and headtracking
- Walking zombie simulation
- Endless survival environment
- Virtual reality gameplay
